tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_supply_chain_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ,
    energy_source TEXT,
    supplier TEXT,
    receiver TEXT,
    quantity NUMERIC,
    blockchain_hash TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE energy_producers (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  energy_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  production_capacity DECIMAL NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_consumers (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  demand INT NOT NULL,
  energy_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_transactions (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  producer_id UUID REFERENCES energy_producers(id),
  consumer_id UUID REFERENCES energy_consumers(id),
  energy_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    producer_id UUID REFERENCES energy_producers(producer_id),
    consumer_id UUID REFERENCES energy_consumers(consumer_id),
    energy_units DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyTransactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    consumer_id INT NOT NULL,
    producer_id INT NOT NULL,
    energy_transferred DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyBlockchain (
    block_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    previous_block_id INT,
    energy_transaction_id INT NOT NULL,
    hash VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
